sections.description: Captures Contact Form 7 form submissions and sends them to a custom endpoint
sections.installation: Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress. Setup the webhook URL, site id, site secret, and api in the plugin settings.
sections.changelog:
Changelog

  • Version 1.0.5 - Added View Details Link | tested on latest version
  • Version 1.0.4 - Improved form submission handling
  • Version 1.0.3 - Initial release
